segments.text: Is it true that one of our competitors is planning to launch their tracking service next month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be WebTracker . We're heard they're almost ready . That's why we have to finish first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Or they'll take over the market before we even get started .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . And that would be a total giga-bummer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess we'd better get back to work .
segments.speaker: S1
